section.name: Welcome to WOProject
section.p: Welcome to WOProject project page. WOProject provides a set of tools to work with WebObjects 5.1 independent from platform and IDE. Even though Apple is doing a great job maintaining cross-platform development tools, for obvious reasons support for such tools on platforms other than Mac has been declining over the years. At the same time in Java world new technologies have emerged that allow to organize and build projects with code, resources and documentation in an IDE-independent fashion. WOProject includes all necessary support to take advantage of these technologies (namely Ant). Even people using latest and greatest ProjectBuilder on Mac may find it useful to organize their code in a portable manner. This IDE independence is partially achieved in current release of WOProject.
Other aspects of WOProject are integration of WebObjects NSLog's with Log4J logging framework, database plugins and other WebObjects utilities.

section.name: Contribute to WOProject
section.p: WOProject is opensource and is shipped under apache-style license. Code contributions, patches and other input from WebObjects developer community are welcomed.
